description:
Looking at the libvirt driver for an example, it would appear that the ironic nova driver does not set a value for disk_available_least. This value is NULL in the nova.compute_nodes table.

disk_available_least MUST be an integer value, since not setting this is causing this tempest test to fail JSON schema validation:

tempest.api.compute.admin.test_hypervisor.HypervisorAdminTestJSON.test_get_hypervisor_show_details
title: Ironic nova driver does not set disk_available_least
